channel.title: FPS Below 10
channel.description: In Areas with objects and NPCS my FPS seems to below 10 and in areas with no objects or npcs its at 40 - 50.... Why is this? Also does computer Performance play a factor in FPS? Any Help?

item.title: FPS Below 10
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Use MAT plugin for eclipse and find out where the memory leak is, if that’s what you think the problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: FPS Below 10
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

You’re right there is a memory leak somewhere. After adding Critical/Floating hits or whatever. i added them server sided also. Seems like there is a memory leak somewhere there, although i cant really pin point where. The files i edited were Player, Combatassistant, and NPCHandler. Any Ideas?

Also, i ran the same source with out the edits i made and the fps was 40 - 50. Using the client i updated so it deffinately cant be the client

Read full topic

item.title: FPS Below 10
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:3, topic:537986”]i actually just added 508 maps could that play a factor too?

Also, the only major thing i added to my server would be Floating Hits. could that play a factor in the downtime?[/quote]
Depends, was it better before you added them? if so, they’re added badly. Regardless it sounds like there is a few memory leaks

Read full topic

item.title: FPS Below 10
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your computer performance and it’s hardware play a huge factor in fps. Also, the client may be eating tons of memory, causing it to bog everything down and slow down…

Read full topic
